meanings.definition: The customs and regulations of a particular trade or profession.
meanings.sent1: Learning the pratiques of carpentry is essential for success in the field.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the pratiques of law is crucial for a lawyer.
meanings.sent3: The pratiques of baking require precise measurements to avoid disasters.
meanings.sent4: Following the pratiques of etiquette is like following a map to good manners.
meanings.sent5: The pratiques of fishing involve knowing the best spots to catch fish.

meanings.definition: The practical aspects of a particular activity or field of study.
meanings.sent1: Exploring the pratiques of gardening can lead to a beautiful backyard.
meanings.sent2: The pratiques of cooking involve hands-on experience in the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: Trying to understand the pratiques of rocket science can make your head spin.
meanings.sent4: The pratiques of painting can turn a blank canvas into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: Mastering the pratiques of swimming can save lives in emergencies.
